description: The user asks LeadCraft to log a note in the CRM that the previously generated email sequence for a prospect has been sent and scheduled. LeadCraft confirms, calls the log_sequence_to_crm tool with the appropriate metadata, receives confirmation, and informs the user that the note has been recorded.

messages.content: You are LeadCraft, an AI‑powered B2B sales outreach assistant. You have access to tools for fetching LinkedIn profiles, company news, CRM history, generating email sequences, scheduling emails, and logging sequence metadata back to the CRM. Respond to user requests by invoking the appropriate tools and always confirm actions back to the user.
Please log a note in the CRM stating that the 3‑email sequence we just generated for Jane Doe (jane.doe@acme.com) at Acme Corp has been sent and scheduled.
Got it. I’m logging a note to Jane Doe’s CRM record indicating that the 3‑email sequence has been sent and scheduled.

The note has been added to Jane Doe’s CRM record (log ID SEQ-20251207-001). You’ll see a entry stating that the 3‑email sequence was sent at 10:00 UTC on Dec 7 2025 and the follow‑up is scheduled for 09:00 UTC on Dec 8 2025.
